overview: Is there a meaning to the thousands of wars fought by mankind? -  Esiste un senso nelle migliaia di guerre combattute dall'umanit√†?  Played over the second Hungarian Rhapsody by Franz Liszt, simulated with a virtual orchestra by Roberto Frattini, "Rapsodeus" shows the nonsense that lays behind every war fought by mankind.  Directed by Bruno Bozzetto. Animated by Studio Alienatio.
tagline: Is there a meaning to the thousands of wars fought by mankind?
title: Rapsodeus
